Ingredients: Yogi Bedtime Tea typically contains a soothing blend of herbs and botanicals, including chamomile, spearmint, lemongrass, licorice root, lavender, and valerian root.
Flavor Profile: The tea has a mild and calming flavor with hints of mint and herbal notes. The combination of ingredients is chosen not just for their potential sleep-inducing properties but also for a pleasant taste.
Relaxation and Sleep Support: Many of the herbs in this tea blend, such as chamomile and valerian root, are traditionally associated with calming effects and may help promote relaxation, making it suitable for evening consumption.
Caffeine-Free: Yogi Bedtime Tea is typically caffeine-free, ensuring that it won't interfere with sleep.
Mindful Packaging: Yogi Tea often includes inspirational messages on the tea bag tags, promoting mindfulness and well-being.

review_title: Herbal Tea for Health Relaxation and Great Taste
review_text:
Herbal tea, also known as herbal infusion or tisane, is a beverage made from the infusion of herbs, spices, flowers, or other plant materials in hot water. It has been consumed for centuries for its various health benefits. Some of the key benefits of herbal tea include:

1. Antioxidant Properties: Many herbal teas are rich in antioxidants, which help protect the body from damage caused by harmful molecules known as free radicals. Antioxidants can help reduce the risk of chronic diseases and promote overall health.

2. Relaxation and Stress Relief: Certain herbal teas, such as chamomile and peppermint tea, have calming properties that can help reduce stress and anxiety. These teas are often used to promote relaxation and improve sleep quality.

3. Digestive Health: Herbal teas like ginger tea and peppermint tea are known for their digestive benefits. They can help alleviate symptoms of indigestion, bloating, and nausea by promoting healthy digestion.

4. Immune System Support: Some herbal teas, such as echinacea and elderberry tea, are believed to boost the immune system and help the body fight off infections and illnesses.

5. Hydration: Herbal teas are a great way to stay hydrated, especially for those who prefer non-caffeinated beverages. Staying hydrated is essential for overall health and well-being.

6. Weight Management: Certain herbal teas, like green tea and dandelion tea, may aid in weight management by boosting metabolism and promoting fat burning.

7. Anti-Inflammatory Effects: Many herbs used in herbal teas have anti-inflammatory properties that can help reduce inflammation in the body and alleviate symptoms of conditions like arthritis.

8. Skin Health: Herbal teas rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds can contribute to healthy skin by reducing oxidative stress and inflammation.

Incorporating a variety of herbal teas into your daily routine can provide a range of health benefits beyond just hydration and flavor.

review_title: Bedtime Brew: A Mixed Bag of Nighttime Calm
review_text:
Yogi Tea's Bedtime blend is a caffeine-free concoction aiming to send you off to dreamland with ease. The quality is undeniable, with Non-GMO Project Verified and USDA Organic certifications ensuring you're sipping on something that's been given a lot of thought and care. The ingredients list reads like an herbalist's dream, packed with a variety of botanicals designed to support a good night's sleep.

However, when it comes to taste, it's a bit of a mixed experience. On its own, the tea carries a unique herbal flavor that may not be everyone's cup of tea, so to speak. And a heads-up for the adventurous—it doesn't play well with milk, which tends to overshadow the delicate blend of flavors rather than complementing them.

The size of the package, coming in at .85 oz (24 g) with 16 tea bags, is pretty standard, offering enough servings to really give it a fair shot. The use of this tea is pretty straightforward—aimed at those looking to wind down after a long day. The package itself is inviting and informative, aligning with Yogi Tea's commitment to sustainability and health as a Certified B Corporation.

The benefit of this tea blend is clear: it's meant to help you relax and prepare for a restful night's sleep. Without caffeine, it's ideal for nighttime consumption, fitting into your evening routine without the worry of staying up all night.

As for serving, sticking to the recommended one tea bag per cup should suffice, allowing the full range of herbal notes to come through. The frequency, ideally, would be as part of your nightly ritual, giving the blend a chance to work its magic over time.

In summary, Yogi Tea's Bedtime blend is a high-quality, thoughtfully crafted tea that aims to soothe and relax. While its taste may not be everyone's favorite, especially when mixed with milk, its potential benefits for sleep might make it worth exploring for those in search of a natural nighttime remedy.

The flavor was bland, and I didn't experience the relaxation promised. It fell short of creating a soothing bedtime experience, and the overall taste lacked depth. Unfortunately, it didn't live up to expectations, and I'll be exploring other bedtime teas for a more satisfying ritual."

review_title: Yogi Bedtime Caffeine Free Tea Bags
review_text:
I appreciate that Yogi Tea is caffeine-free, making it a suitable choice for evening consumption without worrying about sleep disturbances. It's also organic, which is a big plus for those of us who prefer to support sustainable and eco-friendly products.
The combination of quality ingredients, delightful taste, and soothing properties makes it a five-star product in my book. Highly recommended!

Yogi Tea Bedtime, Caffeine-Free, is a soothing and aromatic herbal tea blend crafted to promote relaxation and a peaceful night's sleep. Its blend of herbs and spices, such as valerian root and chamomile, create a delightful bedtime ritual that helps ease the mind and body into a state of calmness, making it an excellent choice for those looking to unwind and enhance their sleep routine.

Tasty, has little bit spicyness in it. Smells great as well, has a calming effect, great tea before bedtime. I drink it with honey before going to bed and I really enjoy such mix of herbs and this brand teas in general. Of course it’s not some pill from drugstore to help with sleep if there are some problems with insomnia. This tea before bedtime is nice, aromatic, tasty ritual to calm down before sleep.

Bedtime tea has become a nightly ritual I eagerly anticipate. This soothing blend, featuring chamomile, lavender, and other calming herbs, wraps me in a warm, tranquil cocoon. Its gentle, herbal notes help unwind the day's stress and prepare me for a restful sleep. The subtle sweetness and comforting aroma create a peaceful bedtime atmosphere. Bedtime tea has become an essential part of my evening routine, ensuring a serene and rejuvenating night's sleep.

review_title: recently had the pleasure of trying Yogi Bedtime Tea
review_text: Yogi Bedtime Tea is a soothing and delicious herbal infusion that has become a staple in my nightly routine. It not only tantalizes the taste buds with its gentle flavors but also offers a peaceful journey to sleep through its relaxation-inducing properties. If you're looking for a caffeine-free tea that can help you wind down and experience a restful night, I highly recommend giving Yogi Bedtime Tea a try. It's a true gem in the world of bedtime teas.

I love the aromatic taste and smell. Very effective for sleeping and the quality is highly recommended. The ingredients are naturally organic materials. Can be use anytime of the day. The size is just perfect . for a cup to drink. What I like most is that this tea is very affordable yet beneficial and caffeine free.

I just love Yogi Tea's. Despite their price point is on the higher end, I have to admit that deliver great quality of tea. Good ingredients, smells and taste calming. 1 serving per time and I use it daily (frequency). Could feel the benefit from the blend of ingredients. Well packed and comes in a palm size box dimension which makes it easy to store.

I use it before bedtime and I fall asleep adter. the bags are beautifully packed. I love this brand and I like the packaging, second time ordering this. I would recommend uf you like to enjoy a hot drink before bedtime. it's caffeine free so guilt free. it calms and soothes

bought some Yogi teas for some time before and they are definitely one of my favorite. started with the "Kava Stress Relief", and now 'Bedtime". I can say you will feel difference and they all have a sweet scent and quality taste. Furthermore they help relax your body and mind. In conclusion If you feel stressed or can't sleep buy it Oand will benefited from them.

I drink this every day before bed. It’s something I look forward to as it is sweet naturally so no need to add sugar. The smell is wonderful and it tastes amazing. I don’t know if it is the ingredients or the smell that gives that calming effect but I have fall in love with this herbal tea

Yogi Tea Bedtime is a great herbal tea blend designed to help promote relaxation and a restful sleep. It contains a blend of herbs including chamomile, passionflower, skullcap, and valerian root, all of which have traditionally been used to support healthy sleep patterns. This tea is also caffeine-free and has a soothing and calming taste.

I love this tea and always have it at home. It was given to me by a colleague who said it would help my difficulty to fall asleep. Seriously...get into your pajamas and have a cup about 20 minutes before bed and it really helps. The flavors are soothing.

As someone who has struggled with occasional difficulty falling asleep, I highly recommend it!!
this one is a very calming and comforting tea, it is a herbal mix of soothing passionflower with relaxing chamomile flower, and the flavour added by the licorice, cardamon, and cinnamon is just amazing and warm. it really helps just giving this boost in sleeping, falling asleep almost instantly, i love drinking tea right before bed and this one is perfect perfect!!

As someone who has struggled with occasional difficulty falling asleep, I have found this tea to be a helpful addition to my bedtime routine. The ritual of brewing a warm cup of tea before bed helps me to unwind and signal to my body that it is time to relax.

this one is a very calming and comforting tea, it is a herbal mix of soothing passionflower with relaxing chamomile flower, and the flavour added by the licorice, cardamon, and cinnamon is just amazing and warm. it really helps just giving this boost in sleeping, falling asleep almost instantly, i love drinking tea right before bed and this one is perfect perfect!!

review_title: Tranquil Nights with Yogi Bedtime Tea
review_text:
The combination of chamomile, valerian root, and other calming herbs creates a delightful scent that sets the perfect ambiance for relaxation.

The tea bags are individually wrapped, ensuring the freshness of each bag, which is a thoughtful touch. The brewing process is simple and quick. I like to steep one tea bag in hot water for about 7-10 minutes, allowing all the beneficial herbs to infuse fully.

Sipping on Yogi Bedtime Tea is like taking a tranquil journey to dreamland. The blend's gentle flavors are soothing to the senses, making it an ideal companion for winding down after a long day. I find that the natural sweetness of chamomile and the earthiness of valerian root create a harmonious balance, promoting a sense of calm and relaxation.

The bags on cups I drink it on bedtime is so good i love the taste & smell of tea its giving me allot of benefits like caffeine & it calms and serving me well and i love the packaging size good and the ingredients is amazing 🤩 thank you iherb for this amazing product I LOVE I HERB TEAM SO MUCH THANK YOU!!!

Yogi Bedtime Tea has been a welcomed addition to my evening routine, helping me achieve a serene and restful sleep. The blend of herbs and botanicals creates a soothing and calming effect, making it easier to unwind and prepare for a good night's rest.

The taste of Yogi Bedtime Tea is gentle and comforting, with a subtle blend of herbal flavors. It's not overpowering, allowing for a pleasant and enjoyable sipping experience before bedtime. The aromatic qualities of the tea also contribute to a relaxed ambiance, setting the stage for a peaceful evening wind-down.

One of the notable benefits of Yogi Bedtime Tea is its potential to promote better sleep quality. The carefully selected herbs, such as chamomile and lavender, have traditionally been associated with relaxation and sleep support. I have personally experienced a sense of tranquility after drinking this tea, which has helped me drift off to sleep more easily.

The inclusion of natural ingredients is a commendable aspect of Yogi Bedtime Tea. It is free from artificial additives and caffeine, making it a suitable choice for those seeking a calming and caffeine-free evening beverage.

I fall asleep right after drinking this tea bag.

The quality of this product is excellent. As a person who has trouble sleeping, it benefits me in that I am able to fall asleep faster. The packaging makes using the tea simple because each tea bag is sized to create the perfect strength, blend, and flavor for a cup of tea. I am able to drink a cup or two as frequent as every night so that each night I ease into sleep and sleep longer without waking as often as I do when I do not have a serving or two before bed.

This is such a nice aromatic blend to go to sleep to.  I'm not sure if it necessarily helps me sleep, but I sure love drinking it at night to relax while watching the TV before bed.  

This is on my regular list of teas!  Definitely give this a try if you're looking for something before bed time.

Yogi Tea Bedtime is a wonderful product for anyone looking for a natural and caffeine-free way to promote relaxation and sleep. The 16 tea bags in the box provide a convenient supply for daily use.

What sets this tea apart is its highly effective formula, which contains a blend of natural ingredients like Chamomile, Lavender, and Valerian root, all of which have been traditionally used to promote relaxation and calmness. I appreciate that it's also made with organic and non-GMO ingredients.

I love the taste of this tea, which has a subtle and soothing flavor. It's also great for people with occasional sleeplessness or those who have trouble falling asleep.

Overall, I highly recommend Yogi Tea Bedtime to anyone looking for a natural and effective way to promote relaxation and sleep. It's a great value for money and provides noticeable results with regular use.

review_title: Always drink it before bed. Helps to fall asleep easily
review_text: In love with this tea! Always drink it before bed. Helps to fall asleep easily. Always buy almost all types of this brand! It's a nice, sweet caffeine-free tea that you can drink before bed. I drink it about half an hour before I go to bed as part of my wind-down routine, and it does help to calm me down. The flavor is pleasant, but a little too minty for my liking, hence four stars.

I tried it for the first time before going to bed and it actually made me a little sleepy after I drank it, it also made me feel calm and prepared for bed. You should drink a cup before going to bed to help you prepare and feel calm and the

Yogi Tea, Bedtime, Caffeine-Free, is a delicious and relaxing tea blend that is perfect for winding down at the end of the day. It is made with a blend of natural herbs, including chamomile, valerian root, and passionflower, which are known for their calming and sleep-promoting properties.
The tea is free from caffeine, making it a great choice for enjoying before bedtime. It has a pleasant and soothing taste, making it a great way to relax and unwind before sleep.
Overall, Yogi Tea, Bedtime, Caffeine-Free, is a great choice for those looking for a natural and effective way to promote relaxation and sleep. It has a great taste and is made with high-quality organic ingredients.

review_title: Excellent tea good for relaxing and improving night time digestion
review_text: Made from quality ingredients, this tea is a blend of helpful herbals for sleep and digestion. It has a pleasant taste and helps me relax and sleep well. I use it to help my digestion quiet down in the evening so I can fall asleep and stay asleep (I have IBS). The 16 sachet sized package comes with individually wrapped tea bags. I drink this tea every night an hour before bed to help me wind down and get ready to sleep.

Wow! I’ve had amazing results after having a cup of this tea before bed. I have definitely noticed an increase in the quality of my sleep as well as a reduction in the time it is taking me to fall asleep. For the first time in a long time I feel as though I’m getting deep, restorative sleep.

The quality was good, the ingredients are all natural and healthy, it tasted good and it’s very easy to us. And the tea blend with the other herbs was good I liked it a lot cause it had no caffeine in it which helped me sleep good and relax

High quality product with strong taste and smell. You have take the attention to  one important  thing  - the product contains stevia plant so it makes the  tea a little bit sweet. This tea will like people that love sweet tastes of tea, or may be  tea with sugar. This tea calms before sleeping.

review_title: This tea really helps me sleep and relax
review_text: This Yogi tea is the easiest and mildest sleep aid I have found.  It also tastes wonderful!  Magnesium powder is stronger and I use that sometimes too if I really can't sleep.. But making this tea is so easy and usually works and I always drink it first if I am having trouble sleeping.. Often if I wake up in the middle of the night I make a cup of this tea and usually fall asleep within 30 minutes.. We highly recommend it!

This tea is very good quality. It's a blend of soothing and relaxing herbs, and it has a pleasant scent and taste too. It doesn't have caffeine which makes it great for drinking in the evening and night time. We drink it often and can feel the benefits when we are stressed out. I will definitely buy it again.

This is a great quality product and works as intended. I use it daily and tastes well. Thank you so much for this. It was made of high quality ingredients with great benefits. Plus the packaging and sizes were perfect. I love the smell and the looks of it. I look forward to purchasing another one!

Where do I start,,, this tea tastes AMAZING. it has this relaxing mellow aroma with a minty, slightly numbing sweet aftertaste on your tongue,, feels refreshing to my tastebuds and knocks me out in around 20-30 minutes. though teas usually have a diuretic effect this might wake you up in the middle of the night for a bathroom break if you use it before bed, at least for me :D 10/10 would sip again 🖤

Lovely taste. The tea is very pleasant and soothing. And I appreciate the little encouragements on the labels of each teabag. The package has 16 tea bags - enough for a small family of two. I don't feel any particular improvements in my sleep but I enjoy the ceremony - late at night with a cup of hot lavender tea - perfection!

I like to buy this tea from time to time but it’s actually one of my least favorite “bedtime” tea, it’s just a personal thing but to me the licorice in it is quite strong. It’s quite sweet for a bedtime tea imo, and I personally prefer the ones from Celestial Seasonings and Traditional Medicinal as those tastes a bit more herbal and refreshing. If you like licorice, try this one instead! :)

I've tried several relaxing teas and Yogi is my favorite brand. This tea has a variety of good herbs in it that apart from help me to relax, I've noticed that help digestion wonderfully. I've tried other Yogi teas and they are always  fresh, and  with more intense taste than most. Yogi "Bedtime" never fails to "prepare" me to have a good night's sleep. Really unfailing quality over the years.  I also give a cup to my children, with a little honey, before bed, and they love it.

This tea is very soothing and relaxing. I love drinking it in the evening with some manuka honey. The Chamomile and Passionflower ingredients makes me feel calm and peaceful. It's a perfect tea to unwind with after a long day. It also smells amazing! Yogi always makes great quality herbal teas.

The first time when I have ordered this tea and I am sure this is not the last one. I love it, very good taste and good ingredients. I wanted something that will good for my baby as well, and I have fount it. She loved it as well and I am calm that she drinks a good quality tea.

review_title: Gread Bedtime relaxing caffeine free tea!!
review_text: This is one of the best night time teas to help you sleep. I noticed a big difference even after the first use. I felt relaxed and calm. Yogi teas are high quality and the taste was great. I am a big fan of the Yogi tea brand and this product does not disappoint.

Everytime i order i must add this to my card i really love the tase and it helps with digestion after food Yogi Spicy Hibiscus Blossom Positive Energy tea combines uplifting Organic Assam Black Tea with Organic Guayusa Leaf and Organic Green Tea Leaf Extract to help energize your body and mind, and keep you going during the day. To this we add sweet-tart Hibiscus Flower, warming Cinnamon, spicy Cayenne Pepper, and notes of fruity Peach flavor. Enjoy a cup of Yogi Spicy Hibiscus Blossom Positive Energy tea for a deliciously intriguing energy tea blend that's sure to leave you feeling invigorated.

Aside of the fact that it tastes well, it provides a mild, comforting feeling and really makes you sleepy. Cannot comment if this helps in case of severe insomnia, however if you’re looking for something calming before bed to soothe you into sleeping better, this definitely does the trick 👌🏻

Yes!! This one is quite addictive for me as it really helps me sleep. I love many yogi teas, this one is however one of my favourites and I love my little night-time wind-down ritual with dimmed lights, my journal and a cup of bedtime tea. Great quality, great taste and I love the little messages included.

review_title: Delicious tea to help you sleep!
review_text: This has quickly become my favourite 'bedtime' tea. review_title: **Delicious and sends me to sleep fast!!**    Yogi Tea, Bedtime, Caffeine Free, 16 Tea Bags, .85 oz (24 g)
review_text: The best sleep tea I have ever tasted.  With a base of Valerian and Passionflower which are VERY potent sleep herbs, this tastes just so good.   Such a bonus that all the herbs are organic.  I highly recommend you try this.  Pleased I tried it as will buy again.  Excellent for nights when you are uptight or think sleep is going to be difficult.  I ENJOY REVIEWING ALL MY PURCHASES to help people MAKE WISE CHOICES.

A cup of this at night, and I really do get sleepy and sleep well.  I usually actually get about 2-3 cups out of one tea bag and start sipping an hour or two before I want to sleep.  
Sleepytime never did this for me, but Bedtime hits the spot and relaxes me.

Nice tea for a bedtime. I drink it in the evening and it helps me to have a better night sleep. 
It’s a bit sweet (because of  stevia leaf and licorice root) and has a flavour of cinnamon. Good list of ingredients. And each teabag has a Yogi inspiration line on it (each teabag a different one).

Tastes good . Quality is good . Use it frequently before bed time . You can serve it with a biscuit . It’s a caffeine free tea . Blend it with peppermint . Benefits your body to relax . Size is just like the picture . Packaging was alright . Good ingredients .

P. incarnata has many common names, including purple passionflower and maypop, which is a main ingredient of this tea. Early studies suggest it might help relieve insomnia and anxiety. It appears to boost the level of gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA) in your brain. This compound lowers brain activity, which may help you relax and sleep better.

In a trial published in Phytotherapy ResearchTrusted Source, participants drank a daily dose of herbal tea with purple passionflower. After seven days, they reported improvements in the quality of their sleep. The researchers suggest that purple passionflower may help adults manage mild sleep irregularities.

review_title: Tastes good and helps with good
review_text:
I have been buying this tea for at least 2 years now. I’ve tried others, but this is my favorite and as far as sleep is concerned, well. . . Just perfect!!
I suggest you adjust the strength if you need to sleep. I have put 3 bags in a cup, left it to brew for 10 minutes before drinking it. Sleep was quicker that way, rather than with just one bag.

review_title: Tastes Awesome And Actually Helps Me Fall Asleep
review_text: This tea tastes really nice. It has a sweetness to it that I really love. I have also noticed that I fall asleep feeling really relaxed on days that I drink this tea. I have also noticed better bowel movements the day after I drink this. It best enjoyed hot as the sweetness doesn’t really come through as well when it’s cold. Will definitely recommend and re-purchase.

I`ve had very bad insomnia for over 12 years. Average around 4 hrs per night. I go to sleep quickly but wake many times in the night. Believe me I`ve tried so many pills & potions I just gave up & lived with it.
I ordered a box of this when I got the other teas & am sooo glad I did.
Since having a cup just before bed for the last week I`ve had more unbroken sleep than I`ve had in 12 years.
I can`t believe something as simple as this great tasting slightly sweet tea could make such a difference.
I`m buying this forever !!!

I sleep late almost every night not bc i have a lot of things to do but bc i just can't go to bed early with so many things on my mind. But this tea kept me so relax and calm. I recommend drinking this 1-2 hours before the time you want to sleep. cos i believe it takes time to be effective. Definitely a good night & early SLEEP! I love yogi tea!

i seem to have gotten my whole family hooked on this tea! my mother's insomniac partner tried it and swears by it for curbing his midnight snack tendencies.
very effective for winding down naturally-- you feel cozy and at ease rather than completely zonked out. in my opinion works better than doxylamine (and so much healthier too).

I like the taste of this tea, it's quite sweet because the added stevia. This is quite relaxing and has helped me to cut down on actual sleeping pills on not-so-bad nights. Anyhow I found the other Yogi tea, Kava stress relief, to be even better sleep aid. I recommend to test both and see wich one suits you best.

review_title: GREAT Relaxing Bedtime Tea! Nice Price!
review_text: Appreciate that this blend is an effective combination of herbs traditionally used for centuries to promote relaxation and sleep. Valerian and Organic Chamomile cam help calm nervousness and restlessness, St. John's Wort is known for its positive effects on mood, while Passion Flower, used in Native American remedies, helps reduce common anxiety to support sleep. Licorice, Cardamom and Cinnamon add a delicious, warming flavor that's just right for drinking before bedtime. So, relax and drink Bedtime tea for a good night's sleep.

1- "some drinks you just enjoy without sweetener"

2- this stevia in particular has an extreme bad aftertaste, so you won't enjoy the sweetness nor the taste of the herbs.
so this won't please anyone!

 3- when I use sweeteners, I like to have them separated, so I can choose which sweetener to use and the quantity to be used!

review_title: Caffeine-Free Herbal Tea for a Relaxing Sleep
review_text: Yogi Tea's Bedtime Tea is an excellent choice for those looking for a natural herbal supplement to help them relax and fall asleep peacefully and without caffeine. Formulated with a blend of calming herbs, such as chamomile, valerian root and lavender flower, this tea is designed to promote a sense of calm and prepare the body for rest. The smooth and pleasant flavour, with hints of mint and cardamom, makes it an ideal infusion to enjoy before bed, creating a relaxing ritual and helping to relieve tensions accumulated during the day. Yogi Tea is renowned for the purity and quality of its ingredients, all of which are 100% natural and free of additives. This tea is caffeine-free, making it perfect for those looking for a natural way to improve the quality of their sleep and relax before bed.

review_title: HOW TO BECOME A HEALTHY PERSON WITH THE HELP OF PROPER SLEEP
review_text: The recipe for becoming a healthy person with the help of proper sleep is simple: You need to go to bed early and get up early. A big mistake is that in the evening people try to finish what they did not have time to do during the day. So they mess around until midnight or later, and in the morning everything starts again. It is much more favorable to go to bed earlier, and then try to get up early in the morning. Then the day will go calmly and measuredly, and you will not need to constantly catch up with time. I strongly urge you not to watch TV before going to bed. You can also not eat at night. Daytime sleep is very unfavorable. An exception is the special need for daytime sleep. For example, when a person is sick or very tired.
